mode.title: Mode
mode.description: File Mode: Extract files to data/out/files. Table Mode: Extract single file to data/out/tables with manifest.

files.title: File Selection
files.description: Select files from the server or enter file paths/patterns manually. In File Mode, wildcards are supported (e.g., /data/*.csv, /logs/**/*.txt). In Table Mode, specify exactly one file path without wildcards.

include_path_in_filename.title: Include Directory Path in Filename
include_path_in_filename.description: Controls output filename format. If disabled (default), extracts only the filename (e.g., some-folder/file.txt -> file.txt). If enabled, preserves the path in the filename with underscores (e.g., some-folder/file.txt -> some-folder_file.txt). All files are always saved to the root of out/files/ directory.

append_timestamp.title: Append Extraction Timestamp
append_timestamp.description: If enabled, adds extraction timestamp to filename (e.g., file_20240108123456.csv)

incremental_mode.title: Incremental Extraction
incremental_mode.description: If enabled, only extracts files that are new or modified since the last extraction

tags.title: File Tags (Optional)
tags.description: Tags to add to extracted files in Keboola Storage

has_header.title: Has Header
has_header.description: If true, the first row contains column names. If false, you must define column names below.

table_name.title: Table Name
table_name.description: Name of the output table (optional, defaults to filename without extension)

primary_key.title: Primary Key
primary_key.description: List of column names that form the primary key

columns.title: Column Names
columns.description: Required when Has Header is false. Define column names in order.

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: If enabled, the component will produce detailed logs
